attributes.action: take affirmative action AGAINST Pakistan for the action of their citizens in the Mumbai massacre
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If proven, as it seems likely, want the PM to take action however drastic against Pakistan, and not to do the pussyfooting as they do against any Islamic nation. If not, I will condone actions of UK's own Islamic terrorists if and when they blow people and properties here in UK. Will have no regrets- this PM deserves it. This will be made public if these terrorist acts happen in the UK.

rejection.details: Your title and petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
